title: Consider adding a status-bar
body: 2.Please add an (optional) status-bar showing the cursor position in X:Y coordinates, Insert key mode, Text selection mode, etc.

comments.body: If you add this, get with the PowerShell team to make sure the status bar can be extended enough to handle things like Write-Progress (display of progress bars) and to display parameter "HelpMessage" when PowerShell prompts the user for a mandatory parameter.
Something like what's in ConEmu would be awesome.
We have three backlog items related to this area. It's great validation to see avid users requesting the same features we want! --Rich
